    FieldDef(1, 'yesno', 'yesno', ('UCH',), dividervalues='0=no;1=yes')

    FieldDef(1, 'energy4', 'energy4', ('ULG',), unit='kWh')

    FieldDef(1, 'from.0', 'from', ('TTM',), comment='slot 1 from/to')
    FieldDef(2, 'to.0', 'to', ('TTM',), comment='to')
    FieldDef(3, 'from.1', 'from', ('TTM',), comment='slot 2 from/to')
    FieldDef(4, 'to.1', 'to', ('TTM',), comment='to')
    FieldDef(5, 'from.2', 'from', ('TTM',), comment='slot 3 from/to')
